disclaimer.title: Before continuing, please pay attention to the following
disclaimer.subtitle:
You will need an ID, a proof of address, a proof of fund provenance (e.g. last pay slip or last tax report) and your Tax ID Number.

All personal information is confidential, is only used for Anti-Money Laundering purposes, and wonâ€™t be shared with your co-investors.

For more details : "How do I perform my KYC check?"

checks_list.title: Help us run necessary verifications
checks_list.subtitle:
Please proceed with the necessary verifications listed below.
Our team will analyze your data and keep you informed about the outcome of your case.

id_document.title: ID document
id_document.description: Please provide a color, unexpired, framed, untrimmed and clear document of the identity card (front / back) or passport (double inside page with the signature)

proof_of_address.callout: Utility bill less than 3-month old, bank statement, ...
